title: Whereas in expectation of conformity to the laws of the land, concerning uniformity of common-prayer and service in the church and the administration of the sacraments ... by the Lords Justices and Council, Mau. Eustace canc., Orrery.
author: Ireland. Lords Justices and Council.
publisher: Printed by John Crook ... and are to be sold by Samuel Dancer ...,
notes: Title from first 3 lines of text.
Statement of responsibility transposed from head of title.
"Given at the Council-chamber in Dublin, the 30. day of April, 1662."
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries Library, London.
